text:
陽光彩虹小白馬
生活是笑話 別哭著聽它
別在意梗垮 不樂是你傻
心要你哄它 一切會好噠
一切都來吧 天地隨你耍
你是內內個 內內 內個內個 內內
內內個 內內 內個內個 內內
陽光彩虹小白馬 滴滴噠滴滴噠
我是內內個 內內 內個內個 內內
內內個 內內 內個內個 內內
陽光彩虹小白馬 滴滴噠滴滴噠
滴滴噠滴噠 滴滴噠滴噠 滴滴噠滴滴噠
滴滴噠滴噠 滴滴噠滴噠 滴滴噠滴滴噠 嘿！
你是 內內個 內內 內個內個 內內
trans:
Sunny rainbow little white pony
Life is a joke, don't listen to it in tears
Don't mind the bad jokes, you are a fool if you don't rejoice
Your heart wants you to cheer it, everthing will be fine
Let everything come, the world is your playground
You are that, that, that, that, that
that, that, that, that, that
Sunny rainbow little white pony, didi da didi da
I am that, that, that, that, that
that, that, that, that, that
Sunny rainbow little white pony, didi da didi da
didi da didi da, didi da didi da, didi da didi da
didi da didi da, didi da didi da, didi da didi da, hey!
You are that, that, that, that, that
